Steve Arnold , an analyst who heads the firm Steve ArnoldIT, faulted Eric Schmidt for leaving Google too dependent on search advertising. It has not diversified its revenue streams in a meaningful way, Steve Arnold said. The financial success that Google has enjoyed has been largely due to ad sales, and was probably little influenced by Eric Schmidt , he said. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come, he said in the statement. The surprise shake-up announced Thursday appears to be driven by Eric Schmidt 's desire to assume more of a behind-the-scenes role as much as Larry Page 's personal ambition. Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Eric Schmidt wrote on his Twitter account moments after Google dropped the bombshell that upstaged its fourth-quarter earnings.
